game.name: Crazy Roads
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Crazy Roads is an endless driving game set on procedurally generated roads. Drive fast for points, which unlock unique cars. Complete challenges for car mastery and customization. A unique World Mode lets you travel the real-life distance between countries, with the goal of visiting them all.
